ar-ae.title: EV3 Robot Trainer
ar-ae.unit_plan_description: هل أنت مستعد لتطوير مهاراتك في الروبوت؟ خذ قاعده القيادة، وكوِّن ملحقاتها واكتب البرامج لإتمام المهام الصعبة!

ar-ae.title: EV3 Engineering Lab
ar-ae.unit_plan_description: هل تهتم بالآلات؟ استعد للعمل كمهندسٍ حقيقي! قم ببناء نماذج رائعة وإجراء تجاربك الخاصة لإتقان مهارات القوة والحركة.

ar-ae.title: EV3 Space Challenge
ar-ae.unit_plan_description: سنذهب إلى المريخ! والأمر متروك لك ولفريقك للقيام بأول رحلة بشرية إلى المريخ. فاحرص على أن يكون لديك طاقم جيد، وتأكد من كون جميع أنظمتك متصلة... ثم ابدأ الانطلاق!

es-mx.title: EV3 Robot Trainer
es-mx.unit_plan_description: ¿Estás listo para desarrollar tus habilidades de robótica? ¡Toma la base motriz, configura sus extensiones y codifica programas para completar tareas desafiantes!

es-mx.title: EV3 Engineering Lab
es-mx.unit_plan_description: ¿Te interesan las máquinas y los mecanismos? ¡Prepárate para trabajar como un ingeniero de verdad! Construye modelos emocionantes y dirige tus propios experimentos para dominar temas como la fuerza y el movimiento.

es-mx.title: EV3 Space Challenge
es-mx.unit_plan_description: ¡Iremos a Marte! ¡Depende de ti y de tu equipo llevar a cabo la primera misión humana a Marte! ¡Asegúrate de tener una buena tripulación, que todos los sistemas estén funcionando... y que comience la cuenta regresiva!

fi-fi.title: EV3 Robot Trainer
fi-fi.unit_plan_description: Ready to train your robotics skills? Take the Driving Base, configure its extensions, and write programs to complete challenging tasks!

fi-fi.title: EV3 Engineering Lab
fi-fi.unit_plan_description: Are you interested in machines? Get ready to work like a real engineer! Build exciting models and conduct your own experiments to master force and motion.

fi-fi.title: EV3 Space Challenge
fi-fi.unit_plan_description: We’re going to Mars! It’s up to you and your team to carry out the first human mission to Mars. Make sure you have a good crew with you, make sure all of your systems are online… and begin the launch!

it-it.title: EV3 Robot Trainer
it-it.unit_plan_description: Preparati a sviluppare capacità nel campo della robotica: prendi la struttura motrice, configurane le estensioni e compila programmi per eseguire attività impegnative.

it-it.title: EV3 Engineering Lab
it-it.unit_plan_description: Hai la passione per le macchine? Preparati a lavorare come un vero ingegnere! Costruisci fantastici modelli e conduci i tuoi esperimenti per il controllo di forza e movimento.

it-it.title: EV3 Space Challenge
it-it.unit_plan_description: Si parte per Marte! La prima missione umana su Marte dipende da te e dal tuo team. Metti insieme un buon equipaggio, accertati che tutti i sistemi siano online e dai inizio al lancio!

ru-ru.title: EV3 Robot Trainer
ru-ru.unit_plan_description: Готовы расширить свои знания в сфере робототехники? Возьмите Приводную платформу, установите на неё устройства и создавайте программы для выполнения сложных задач!

ru-ru.title: EV3 Engineering Lab
ru-ru.unit_plan_description: Интересуетесь машинами? Приготовьтесь стать настоящим инженером! Собирайте удивительные модели и проводите собственные эксперименты, чтобы освоить законы силы и движения.

ru-ru.title: EV3 Space Challenge
ru-ru.unit_plan_description: Мы летим на Марс! Вашей группе предстоит осуществить первый пилотируемый полёт на Марс! Подберите грамотный экипаж, проверьте работу всех систем… и приступайте к запуску!

school_grades.title: Grades 6-8
school_grades.value: Groep 8 tot en met de tweede klas

nl-nl.title: EV3 Robot Trainer
nl-nl.unit_plan_description: Ben je er klaar voor om je roboticavaardigheden te trainen? Pak de rijbasis erbij, bouw de uitbreidingen en schrijf programma‘s waarmee je de meest uitdagende taken kunt uitvoeren!

school_grades.title: Grades 6-8
school_grades.value: Groep 8 tot en met de tweede klas

nl-nl.title: EV3 Engineering Lab
nl-nl.unit_plan_description: Vind je machines interessant? Kruip dan in de huid van een echte ingenieur! Bouw gave modellen, voer zelf experimenten uit en kom zo alles te weten over kracht en beweging.

school_grades.title: Grades 6-8
school_grades.value: Groep 8 tot en met de tweede klas

nl-nl.title: EV3 Space Challenge
nl-nl.unit_plan_description: We gaan naar Mars! Jij en je team zijn verantwoordelijk voor de eerste bemande missie naar Mars. Zorg voor een goede bemanning, controleer of alle systemen online zijn ... en begin de lancering!

pt-br.title: EV3 Robot Trainer
pt-br.unit_plan_description: Pronto para treinar suas habilidades em robótica? Pegue a Base Motriz, configure suas extensões e escreva programas para completar tarefas desafiadora!

pt-br.title: EV3 Engineering Lab
pt-br.unit_plan_description: Você tem interesse em máquinas? Prepare-se para trabalhar como um engenheiro de verdade! Construa modelos empolgantes e conduza seus próprios experimentos para dominar força e movimento.

pt-br.title: EV3 Space Challenge
pt-br.unit_plan_description: Estamos indo para Marte! Cabe a você e sua equipe realizar a primeira missão humana a Marte. Certifique-se de ter uma boa tripulação com você, certifique-se de todos os seus sistemas estão online ... e comece o lançamento!

fr-fr.title: EV3 Robot Trainer
fr-fr.unit_plan_description: Prêts à développer vos compétences en robotique ? Prenez la base motrice, configurez ses extensions et écrivez des programmes pour accomplir des tâches difficiles !

fr-fr.title: EV3 Engineering Lab
fr-fr.unit_plan_description: Les machines vous intéressent ? Préparez-vous à devenir de véritables ingénieurs ! Construisez des modèles passionnants et menez vos propres expériences pour étudier la force et le mouvement.

fr-fr.title: EV3 Space Challenge
fr-fr.unit_plan_description: En route pour Mars ! Votre équipe a été chargée de mener la toute première mission humaine sur Mars ! Sélectionnez les meilleurs astronautes, mettez tous les systèmes en service et lancez le compte à rebours.

nb-no.title: EV3 Robot Trainer
nb-no.unit_plan_description: Er du klar til å forbedre robotikk-ferdighetene dine? Ta kjørebasen, konfigurer utvidelsene, og lag programmer for å fullføre utfordrende oppgaver!

nb-no.title: EV3 Engineering Lab
nb-no.unit_plan_description: Er du interessert i maskiner? Gjør deg klar til å arbeide som en ekte ingeniør! Bygg spennende modeller og gjennomfør dine egne eksperimenter for å mestre kraft og bevegelse.

nb-no.title: EV3 Space Challenge
nb-no.unit_plan_description: Vi drar til Mars! Det er opp til deg og teamet ditt å utføre det første bemannede oppdraget til Mars! Kontroller at dere har et godt mannskap, sørg for at alle systemene er operative ... og begynn oppskytingen!

pl-pl.title: EV3 Robot Trainer
pl-pl.unit_plan_description: Ready to train your robotics skills? Take the Driving Base, configure its extensions, and write programs to complete challenging tasks!

pl-pl.title: EV3 Engineering Lab
pl-pl.unit_plan_description: Are you interested in machines? Get ready to work like a real engineer! Build exciting models and conduct your own experiments to master force and motion.

pl-pl.title: EV3 Space Challenge
pl-pl.unit_plan_description: We’re going to Mars! It’s up to you and your team to carry out the first human mission to Mars. Make sure you have a good crew with you, make sure all of your systems are online… and begin the launch!

en-us.title: EV3 Robot Trainer
en-us.unit_plan_description: Ready to train your robotics skills? Take the Driving Base, configure its extensions, and write programs to complete challenging tasks!

en-us.title: EV3 Engineering Lab
en-us.unit_plan_description: Are you interested in machines? Get ready to work like a real engineer! Build exciting models and conduct your own experiments to master force and motion.

en-us.title: EV3 Space Challenge
en-us.unit_plan_description: We’re going to Mars! It’s up to you and your team to carry out the first human mission to Mars. Make sure you have a good crew with you, make sure all of your systems are online… and begin the launch!

ko-kr.title: EV3 Robot Trainer
ko-kr.unit_plan_description: 여러분의 로봇공학 기술을 훈련해볼 준비가 되었나요? 드라이빙 베이스를 조립하고, 확장 요소를 구성하고, 도전 과제를 완료하기 위해 필요한 프로그램을 작성해 보세요!

ko-kr.title: EV3 Engineering Lab
ko-kr.unit_plan_description: 기계에 관심이 많나요? 실제 엔지니어처럼 과제를 수행할 준비를 하세요! 재미있는 모델을 조립하고 힘과 운동의 원리를 이해하기 위한 실험을 시작해보아요.

ko-kr.title: EV3 Space Challenge
ko-kr.unit_plan_description: 화성으로 가보아요! 최초의 유인 화성 탐사 미션유인 화성 탐사 미션의 성공적인 수행 여부는 여러분과 여러분의 팀에 달려있습니다. 유능한 승무원 팀을 구성하고, 모든 시스템이 온라인에 연결되어 있는지 확인하고… 출발하세요!

en-gb.title: EV3 Robot Trainer
en-gb.unit_plan_description: Are you ready to train your robotics skills? Configure the extensions for the Driving Base and write programs to complete challenging tasks!

en-gb.title: EV3 Engineering Lab
en-gb.unit_plan_description: Are you interested in machines? Get ready to work like a real engineer! Build exciting models and conduct your own experiments to master force and motion.

en-gb.title: EV3 Space Challenge
en-gb.unit_plan_description: We’re going to Mars! It’s up to you and your team to carry out the first human mission to Mars. Make sure that you have a good crew with you, make sure that all of your systems are online… and begin the launch!

tr-tr.title: EV3 Robot Trainer
tr-tr.unit_plan_description: Ready to train your robotics skills? Take the Driving Base, configure its extensions, and write programs to complete challenging tasks!

tr-tr.title: EV3 Engineering Lab
tr-tr.unit_plan_description: Are you interested in machines? Get ready to work like a real engineer! Build exciting models and conduct your own experiments to master force and motion.

tr-tr.unit_plan_description: We’re going to Mars! It’s up to you and your team to carry out the first human mission to Mars. Make sure you have a good crew with you, make sure all of your systems are online… and begin the launch!

de-de.title: EV3 Robot Trainer
de-de.unit_plan_description: Wer will seine Robotik-Fähigkeiten verbessern? Erweiterungen für das Fahrgestell bauen und Programme schreiben, um eine anspruchsvolle Aufgabe zu lösen.

de-de.title: EV3 Engineering Lab
de-de.unit_plan_description: Sind Maschinen nicht interessant? Bei dieser Aufgabe ist echte Ingenieurskunst gefragt! Mit spannenden Modellen und eigenen Experimenten werden in dieser Aufgabe Kräfte und Bewegung untersucht.

de-de.title: EV3 Space Challenge
de-de.unit_plan_description: Wir fliegen zum Mars! Die Teams sollen die erste bemannte Mission zum Mars durchführen. Sie brauchen eine gute Besatzung und müssen sicherstellen, dass alle Systeme funktionieren. Dann folgt der Start!

vi-vn.title: EV3 Robot Trainer
vi-vn.unit_plan_description: Ready to train your robotics skills? Take the Driving Base, configure its extensions, and write programs to complete challenging tasks!

vi-vn.title: EV3 Engineering Lab
vi-vn.unit_plan_description: Are you interested in machines? Get ready to work like a real engineer! Build exciting models and conduct your own experiments to master force and motion.

vi-vn.title: EV3 Space Challenge
vi-vn.unit_plan_description: We’re going to Mars! It’s up to you and your team to carry out the first human mission to Mars. Make sure you have a good crew with you, make sure all of your systems are online… and begin the launch!

es-es.title: EV3 Robot Trainer
es-es.unit_plan_description: Ready to train your robotics skills? Take the Driving Base, configure its extensions, and write programs to complete challenging tasks!

es-es.title: EV3 Engineering Lab
es-es.unit_plan_description: Are you interested in machines? Get ready to work like a real engineer! Build exciting models and conduct your own experiments to master force and motion.

es-es.title: EV3 Space Challenge
es-es.unit_plan_description: We’re going to Mars! It’s up to you and your team to carry out the first human mission to Mars. Make sure you have a good crew with you, make sure all of your systems are online… and begin the launch!

da-dk.title: EV3 Robot Trainer
da-dk.unit_plan_description: Er du klar til at træne dine kompetencer i robotteknologi? Tag chassiset, konfigurer dens udvidelser, og skriv programmer for at gennemføre udfordrende opgaver!

da-dk.title: EV3 Engineering Lab
da-dk.unit_plan_description: Er du interesseret i maskiner? Gør dig klar til at arbejde som en rigtig ingeniør! Byg spændende modeller, og udfør dine egne eksperimenter for at mestre kraft og bevægelse.

da-dk.title: EV3 Space Challenge
da-dk.unit_plan_description: Vi skal til Mars! Det er op til dig og dit hold at gennemføre den første bemandede mission til Mars. Sørg for at have en god besætning med, sørg for, at alle systemer er online ... og start affyringen!

sv-se.title: EV3 Robot Trainer
sv-se.unit_plan_description: Är du redo att förbättra dina kunskaper i robotteknik? Ta körningsbasen, konfigurera de nya delarna och skriv program för att klara utmaningarna!

sv-se.title: EV3 Engineering Lab
sv-se.unit_plan_description: Är du intresserad av maskiner? Snart får du prova på att arbeta som en riktig ingenjör! Bygg intressanta modeller och utför egna experiment för att lära dig allt om kraft och rörelse.

sv-se.title: EV3 Space Challenge
sv-se.unit_plan_description: Vi åker till Mars! Du och ditt team ansvarar för att göra den första bemannade expeditionen till Mars. Se till att du har en bra besättning och att alla system fungerar. Sedan kan nedräkningen börja.

en-au.title: EV3 Robot Trainer
en-au.unit_plan_description: Ready to train your robotics skills? Take the Driving Base, configure its extensions, and write programs to complete challenging tasks!

en-au.title: EV3 Engineering Lab
en-au.unit_plan_description: Are you interested in machines? Get ready to work like a real engineer! Build exciting models and conduct your own experiments to master force and motion.

en-au.title: EV3 Space Challenge
en-au.unit_plan_description: We’re going to Mars! It’s up to you and your team to carry out the first human mission to Mars. Make sure you have a good crew with you, make sure all of your systems are online… and begin the launch!

zh-cn.title: EV3 Robot Trainer
zh-cn.unit_plan_description: 准备好训练你的机器人技能了吗？准备驱动底座，搭建扩展部分并编写程序，完成具有挑战性的任务！

zh-cn.title: EV3 Engineering Lab
zh-cn.unit_plan_description: 你对机器感兴趣吗？那准备像真正的工程师一样工作吧！搭建令人激动的模型，进行自己的实验，从而掌握力和运动的知识。

zh-cn.title: EV3 Space Challenge
zh-cn.unit_plan_description: 我们将要前往火星啦！完成人类第一次火星探索任务的重任要落在你和你的团队身上了。请确保拥有优秀的队员，并且所有系统都联线......然后，准备发射！

school_grades.title: Grades 6-8
school_grades.value: 小学校高学年・中高校

subjects.title: Computer Science
subjects.value: コンピューターサイエンス

ja-jp.title: EV3 Robot Trainer
ja-jp.unit_plan_description: ロボティクスの腕を鍛える準備はできていますか？ドライビングベースを用意したら、拡張パーツを組み立ててプログラムを書き、挑戦しがいのあるタスクを完了しましょう！

ja-jp.unit_plan_title: エンジニアリングラボ

school_grades.title: Grades 6-8
school_grades.value: 小学校高学年・中高校

ja-jp.title: EV3 Engineering Lab
ja-jp.unit_plan_description: 機械は好きですか？このユニットではエンジニアの仕事を体験することができます！楽しいモデルを作ったり、自分たちで実験を行いながら、力と運動について学びましょう。

school_grades.title: Grades 6-8
school_grades.value: 小学校高学年・中高校

ja-jp.title: EV3 Space Challenge
ja-jp.unit_plan_description: 火星に出発です！人類初の火星ミッションがみなさんに託されました。優秀な乗組員を集め、すべてのシステムをネットワークにつないだら、さっそく打ち上げ準備開始です！
